detail_desc: Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jersey vest top in a soft cotton blend with a print motif on the front and ties at the hem.
3/4-length leggings in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back and back of the neck.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Headband in a soft rib knit with a decorative knot detail at the front. Width approx. 11 cm.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.
Lace cardigan with 3/4-length dolman sleeves, a rounded hem and no buttons.
Thin metal Alice band decorated with shimmering plastic beads.

Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and a one-button fastening at the front. Relaxed fit with shoulder pads, long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, a chest pocket, flap front pockets, an inner pocket, and a single back vent. Lined.
Satin baseball jacket with appliqués on the front, a small, ribbed, stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Mules with open toes, satin linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 1.5 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slightly wider, tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the back. Mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long gilet in a soft rib knit with open sides held together by double straps. No fasteners.

Set with a matching bracelet and necklace in narrow metal chain. Bracelet with pearly beads and small plastic shells. Adjustable length 15-18 cm. Necklace with a metal, starfish-shaped pendant and shimmering plastic bead. Adjustable length 34-41 cm. Both with trigger clasps.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and trousers with braces in soft organic cotton. Bodysuit in ribbed jersey with a button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in woven fabric with braces that button at the front and elastication at the back of the waist and at the hems.
Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke front and back. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a tie belt at the waist.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with high-cut legs and a high cut at the back.
Imitation leather card holder with four card slots and one note compartment. Size 7x10 cm.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.

Suit trousers in a textured stretch weave with an extended waistband with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long raglan sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Glittery metal hair clips with fabric butterflies.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fine-knit socks.
Gloves knitted in a soft cashmere blend with a long, ribbed shaft.
Short, padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the sides of the hem. Lined.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with pointed toes, a large, decorative bow at the front and a loop at the back. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 0.9 cm.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Knee-length shorts in patterned twill with a regular waist with pleats at the top. Zip fly with a button, side pockets and welt back pockets with a flap and concealed button.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with long puff sleeves.
Short A-line skirt.
Calf-length skirt in a cotton crêpe weave with a high waist with elasticated smocking and a raw-edge frill trim at the top. Lined.
High-waisted, 5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front.
Top in waffled jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved dress in a cotton weave with buttons at the back of the neck, a yoke with decorative gathers front and back, and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sandals with an adjustable ankle strap, metal buckle and concealed elastication. Imitation leather insoles and chunky soles. Platform front 2.5 cm. Heel 11 cm.

Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon with gathers and a small frill at the shoulders, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with frilled tiers. Lined.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details. Slim fit with a regular waist and zip fly.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Jumpsuit woven in a linen blend with a collar, large buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, flap chest pockets, side pockets and flap leg and back pockets.

V-neck playsuit in an airy weave with a wrapover front, 3/4-length sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs. Button at the back of the neck and an opening all the way down the back. Unlined.
Knee-length lace dress with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip at the back.
Shirt in softly draping silk with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Hat in braided paper straw containing glittery threads with cat ears at the top and an embroidered motif on the front. Width of brim 6 cm.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Straight-cut coat in a soft weave with notch lapels, a one-button fastening, diagonal welt front pockets, and a single back vent. Unlined. The polyester content of the coat is recycled.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a pair of jersey leggings. Top in a slightly longer style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in a printed viscose weave. Short-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, slits in the sides and a slightly longer, rounded back. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Short-sleeved top in big hole mesh with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Short wrap dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck and short sleeves. Ties at the waist and frill trims around the neckline, down the front and at the hem. Unlined.
Imitation suede boots with a zip up the front and loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform approx. 3 cm.
Short dress in viscose jersey with a V-neck and a yoke and short butterfly sleeves in lace. Seam with narrow elastication and a tie belt under the bust.
Thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.

Long, padded jacket in a nylon weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with concealed press-studs that fastens at the front with concealed press-studs. Zip down the front, side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
Long-sleeved lace top with smocking, a smocked stand-up collar, transparent yoke, and smocking and a flounce at the cuffs. Partly lined.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides with decorative narrow straps, and a string back.
Lined bandeau bikini top with a flounced trim and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back, a concealed silicone trim at the top and side support.
Wallet in woven fabric with a hook and loop fastener and plastic D-ring. Note compartment, zipped compartment, mesh compartment and three small compartments. Size 9x14 cm.
Wide top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and short dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Leather gloves with suede uppers and a decorative bow at the top. Knitted lining.
Tulle skirt with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in a patterned weave with a V-neck and spaghetti straps.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
